dilli tharagayedi kandayama dakwu daskam gana godak adambarayi..apita tharagawaliya jaya ganan bari wunath api tharagawaliya purama hodin satan kala..suranga ge panduyawimata wishishtayi..chandimalge inima mama dakapu hodama nayakathwaye inima..dewani inimedi ape tharuna ka්ridakayin wana dhananjaya roshen dikwalla adhishtanashili pithiharambaayaka niratha wuna..api hama witama sahayogaya laba demin api dhairyamath kala siyalu pe්rakshakayinta sthuthiya..ekdina tharagawaliyedi api ape uparimaya karanna balaporoththuwen innawa.

sankhya lekhana anshaye sewawanrajaye sewakayansewaka parshawaya nawa liyapadinchi kirim saha nawatha liyapadinchi kirima.pudgalika sewakayinsewaka parshawaya nawa liyapadinchi kirim saha nawatha liyapadinchi kirima.“kalapiya rakiraksha sewa eekaka” haraha rakiya wetha yomu kirima.wiwidha wargaye apakara labadimarakiya awastha“kalapiya rakiraksha sewa eekaka” haraha rakiya wetha yomu kirima.“margagatha rakiya bankuwa” haraha rakiya wetha yomu kirima.nawikayan liyapadinchi kirimanawikayin sewaye yedawima.sapayumkaruweku wimatanawikayin sewayen midawima widesha rakiyakoriyawa sandaha wigamanika shramikayin puhunu kirima ha sahathika kirima.gruha sewaka ha juki kriyakaruwan puhunu kirima ha sahathika kirima.purappadu ha niyojithayan liyapadinchi kirima sadaha anumathiya labadimashishyathwa laba ganima.widesha rakiya niyojitha aayathana sadaha balapathra laba ganima.niwasa naya laba ganima.swayan rakiya naya laba ganima.widesha niyojitha aayathanayanhi balapathra aluth kirima.wgamanika shramikaya guwan thotupalehidi sahaya laba ganima.sankramanika shramikayan sandaha rakshana oppu laba ganima.wideshagatha wimata pera dena naya laba ganima.waidya sayanayakata sahabhagi wima.wigamanika ෙswakayaneg yaepannan sadaha rakshanawaranayanithi sewawan laba ganima.

eewa nithara ema puwathpath ha sangarawala pala wiya.me nisama mata aluthin elidakina sarasawiya puwathpatha kerehi wishesha aashawak athi wuye eya kalawata sahithyayata pramukhathawaya dena bawa sandahan kara thibima nisaya.

'ethakota abhyanthara arbudayak, wame arbudayak, wishaya mula thathwayak, manomula sadhakayak karthumaya sadhakayak, arbudaye morayamak, dwandanathmaka bhauthikawadayak, pudgala sadhakawala balapamak, upayamargika parajayak, nishchitha wichalanayak nathi da?'

mage natyawalin thamayi denawaka hamine, dhamma jagoda, shi්rayani amarasena, buddhi wika්rama, liyoni kothalawala, sugathapala senarath yapa, sheltan silwa, elsan diwithuragama, gamini wijesuriya, gamini wika්ramasuriya, dharmadasa wanniaarachchi, daglas karunarathna, soma kirialla, mallika perera, dewananda wedyasekara, jayathissa alahakon, monika wirasinha yana aya kala lokayata aawe.

2008 agosthu 08 wanida sita sapthambar masa 17 wanada athara kalayedi kotahena, wallawaththa, thrikunamalaya, madakalapuwa athulu sthana kihipayakadi tharunayin 11 deneku athurudan wu bawa kiyana siddhiyakata adalawa parikshana sidukarana lesa illamin hitapu nawika hamudapathiwaraya wisin mema siddhiyata adalawa aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwata paminili kota thibini.
oya okkotama kalin kiyanna ayi api demalenuth kiya yuththe?
kese wethath awasan wata dekama jaya gath nawika hamuda kandayama tharagaya jaya gaththe wata 3-1k lesini.
ehema aya innawada kiyala mama hitha yomu karanne na.
owun pittaniyaka sitiya nam yam thakseruwak karanna thibuna.
me tharagawaliya patan ganna kalin api danagena hitiye shri lanka kandayama dakshatha athara naha kiyala.
ee sandaha kisidu awasarayak na.
mama anithya dukkha anathma yana aakarayen siyalla thrilakshanayata naga bhawana kirimata shakthimath wannemda nowannemdayi mese thaman wisin kalanokala de baliya yuthuya yanu arthayi.
eeka rajayen “mudra natya dinaya” lesa nam kara thibenawa.
me nisa ema sampreshana margaya asala thibu niwasa dekak ginigos winasha wi athi athara thawath niwasa 500 kata widuliya wisandhi wi thibe.
eeye (ekoloswani da) uthsawaya pawathwune pansal bhumiye ranawiru smarakayak godanagimata mulgal thabima sandaha.
akka eyata tharaha gihin baninawa.
namuth eeta pasuwa papandu ha an kisiwak natha.
ee nisama owun lankawe pradhanathama studiyo atharinda idiriyata pamina thibe.
katha kandayamatath jaya, sathuta saha samayen piri subhama subha aluth awuruddak wewa !!.
ema nayakaththwa depala ada rate bihi wi thibenawa.
wada wadi watinakamak dimata gath uthsahayaki.
samajaye sthapithawa athi atham wishwasa paddhathin, sampradayayan ho drushtiwada ganna.
